divs: Sighting DetailsMe and my cousin were driving in saint joe county indiana right outside mishawaka indiana when we saw a VERY bright light in the distance at first we dismissed it as an motorcycle because of their only being a single light until the light shot some 2-3 miles into the distance of the cornfield after seeing this we accelerated as fast as our 1999 monte carlo would go (around 90-100 mph) to try to lose the "light" it seemed to jump incredible distances in a matter of a second moving from south east to south west behind us maybe a mile or so away after trying to get away from this mysterious light for some time maybe 7 mins or so it disappeared... what really struck me as strange was the static interference on our radio and there was absolutely no sound (no chopper rotary sounds or aircraft afterburner sounds) that would be associated with modern aircraft
Summary: made impossible aerial maneuvers with extraordinary speed.
trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Mishawaka
There were no other sightings in Mishawaka on or around June 20th 2011
